attributes.action: Reject the EU referendum result: do not invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details:
Many of the electorate regret voting to Leave the EU: http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-eu-referendum-bregret-leave-petition-second-remain-latest-will-we-leave-a7105116.html

The Official Campaign have 'backpedaled': http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/25/leave-campaign-rows-back-key-pledges-immigration-nhs-spending

Uncertainty has made the economy volatile: https://www.theguardian.com/business/2016/jun/26/leap-unknown-threatens-europe-global-economy-brexit-greenspan
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, hereby petition parliament for the EU referendum result to be rejected. The margin of 1.9% is not statistically significant to represent the so-called 'will of the people', and is based on a campaign of misnomer/spurious information put towards the electorate.
